result.rule: "import" statements after other statements are not allowed (arkts-no-misplaced-imports)
Importing directly from "JS" module is not supported (arkts-interop-js2s-import-js)
Use explicit types instead of "any", "unknown" (arkts-no-any-unknown)
Use explicit types instead of "any", "unknown" (arkts-no-any-unknown)
ArkTS directly instantiated JS objects is not supported (arkts-interop-js2s-create-js-instance)
"JS" objects can't be used directly as operands of the equality operators (arkts-interop-js2s-equality-judgment)
Properties of interop objects can't be accessed directly (arkts-interop-js2s-access-js-prop)
ArkTS directly instantiated JS objects is not supported (arkts-interop-js2s-create-js-instance)
